1926 Spalding Champions Joe Sewell (NM to NM-MT) with beautiful PSA/DNA autograph!--$130

1954 Topps Baltimore Orioles team set with (16) cards average (EX-MT)--$80

James- What does the back of the Obak Perry card look like? Can you send me a scan?
